item.title: How to turn your #GivingTuesday donations into a sustainable base of support
item.description: Every year, an incredible amount of work goes into #GivingTuesday campaigns and strategies––but just because the big day of giving is over, doesn’t mean the work is done. In this webinar, you'll learn about the tools and tactics that will help you take the progress you made leading up to #GivingTuesday and transform it into a sustainable base of support for your cause.
item.author: Katie Angelo

item.title: Automated and personalized donation receipts with Facturly
item.description: In this video we cover an overview of how Facturly Receipts sends automatic and personalized donation receipts, so you can thank your community, meet your regulatory requirements, and more, for any type of donation.
item.author: Jesse Haff

item.title: Building community power before, during, and after the UK election with New/Mode - Recording
item.description: In this video, we'll walk through how you can use New/Mode and NationBuilder to build community power before, during, and after the UK election.
item.author: Katie Angelo

item.title: GOTV best practices to win your election
item.description: If you haven't thought about your GOTV strategy, or are still looking for something to give your turnout program a winning edge—watch this.
item.author: Jesse Haff

item.title: Quick wins to optimize your #GivingTuesday strategy
item.description: Learn how these quick tactics can take your #GivingTuesday strategy to the next level.
item.author: Jesse Haff

item.title: Chatbox Webinar Recording - A fully-featured text messaging platform
item.description: In this video, we'll walk through the features of Chatbox and how it is a fully-featured text messaging platform helping organizations deliver personalized, hyper-local and data-driven messaging experiences at scale.
item.author: Jesse Haff

item.title: Key Tactics in Surpassing your Fundraising Goals
item.description: Fundraising, especially if you're running for office, can be one of the most daunting challenges you have to face. So how do the most successful fundraisers consistently hit their fundraising goals week after week, month after month?
item.author: Jesse Haff

item.title: Turn volunteers into leaders with SupporterBase
item.description: In this video we cover an overview of how SupporterBase turn volunteers into leaders and grow your movement with distributed organizing with the NationBuilder platform.
item.author: Jesse Haff

item.title: Learn How to Run for Office in 60 Minutes
item.description: Whether you're considering running for your local school board, or interested in a future presidential race, this webinar will equip you with the tools you need to step up and lead.
item.author: Jesse Haff

item.title: Unlock the Power of Your Supporter Data Recording
item.description: What makes today's most impactful organizations so effective? Chances are, they're digitally savvy and making data-driven decisions on a daily basis. This webinar will teach you all you need to know, watch now!
item.author: Jesse Haff

item.title: MyActionCenter - an online action center for supporters
item.description: In this video we cover an overview of how MyActionCenter enables organizations to quickly deploy an online action center for supporters using the NationBuilder platform.
item.author: Jesse Haff

item.title: How to Optimize your Action Center for Supporter Conversion
item.description: Have you ever wondered why some digital action centers are better than others? How do the top advocacy organizations mobilize their constituents to action?
item.author: Jesse Haff

item.title: How To Build Effective Issues-Based Email Campaigns
item.description: Learn how to build effective issues-based email campaigns that drive supporters to action.
item.author: Jesse Haff

item.title: GDPR: An opportunity to better target your people
item.description: Learn how you can use GDPR as an opportunity to better target voters, supporters and other members of the public.
item.author: Jesse Haff

item.title: The Secret to Lowering the Cost of Supporter Acquisition
item.description: Learn simple tips to make your supporter acquisition budget go further by working with NationBuilder.
item.author: Jesse Haff

item.title: New NationBuilder Control Panel Walkthrough
item.description: Today we are walking through the new NationBuilder control panel tab by tab.
item.author: Jesse Haff

item.title: Ecanvasser and NationBuilder - elevate your ground game
item.description: Demo of Ecanvassar and Ecanvasar GO — apps that allow you to send people out in the field and log contacts with results that sync back to NationBuilder.
item.author: Jesse Haff

item.title: Why Putting People at the Center Matters
item.description: Learn how to leverage one fully-integrated system to power all of your engagement and mobilization work.
item.author: Jesse Haff

item.title: HandyNation updates - Event management, canvassing & more
item.description: HandyNation updates - You can now create lists, see who in your database is near you, RSVP people for events and check them in and canvas all on your mobile.
item.author: Jesse Haff

item.title: WinWith.Me - A Facebook Messenger bot-building tool
item.description: Click to learn more about WinWith.Me a Facebook Messenger bot for political campaigns that connects to your nation.
item.author: Jesse Haff
